snippet: The world’s largest mining company reported a 31 percent increase in its profit for the first half of its fiscal year.
abstract: BHP Billiton reports fiscal first-half profit of $7.76 billion, up 31 percent from $5.94 billion in year-ago half; revenue rose 5.9 percent to $33.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest mining company reported a 31 percent increase in its profit for the first half of its fiscal year.

headline.main: As Profits Surge, BHP Billiton Weighs Higher Dividend
headline.print_headline: As Profits Surge, BHP Billiton Weighs Higher Dividend
